Package com.wrapper.spotify.requests.data.playlists

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddTracksToPlaylistRequest
    Add one or more tracks to a user’s playlist.
    AddTracksToPlaylistRequest.Builder
    Builder class for building an AddTracksToPlaylistRequest.
    ChangePlaylistsDetailsRequest
    Change a playlist’s name and public/private state.
    ChangePlaylistsDetailsRequest.Builder
    Builder class for building a ChangePlaylistsDetailsRequest.
    CreatePlaylistRequest
    Create a playlist for a Spotify user.
    CreatePlaylistRequest.Builder
    Builder class for building a CreatePlaylistRequest.
    GetListOfCurrentUsersPlaylistsRequest
    Get a list of the playlists owned or followed by the current Spotify user.
    GetListOfCurrentUsersPlaylistsRequest.Builder
    Builder class for building a GetListOfCurrentUsersPlaylistsRequest
    GetListOfUsersPlaylistsRequest
    Get a list of the playlists owned or followed by a Spotify user.
    GetListOfUsersPlaylistsRequest.Builder
    Builder class for building a GetListOfUsersPlaylistsRequest.
    GetPlaylistCoverImageRequest
    Get the current image associated with a specific playlist.
    GetPlaylistCoverImageRequest.Builder
    Builder class for building a GetPlaylistCoverImageRequest.
    GetPlaylistRequest
    Get a playlist owned by a Spotify user.
    GetPlaylistRequest.Builder
    Builder class for building a GetPlaylistRequest.
    GetPlaylistsTracksRequest
    Get full details of the tracks of a playlist owned by a Spotify user.
    GetPlaylistsTracksRequest.Builder
    Builder class for building a GetPlaylistsTracksRequest.
    RemoveTracksFromPlaylistRequest
    Remove one or more tracks from a user’s playlist.
    RemoveTracksFromPlaylistRequest.Builder
    Builder class for building a RemoveTracksFromPlaylistRequest.
    ReorderPlaylistsTracksRequest
    Reorder a track or a group of tracks in a playlist.
    ReorderPlaylistsTracksRequest.Builder
    Builder class for building a ReorderPlaylistsTracksRequest.
    ReplacePlaylistsTracksRequest
    Replace all the tracks in a playlist, overwriting its existing tracks.
    ReplacePlaylistsTracksRequest.Builder
    Builder class for building a ReplacePlaylistsTracksRequest.
    UploadCustomPlaylistCoverImageRequest
    Replace the image used to represent a specific playlist.
    UploadCustomPlaylistCoverImageRequest.Builder
    Builder class for building an UploadCustomPlaylistCoverImageRequest.
